resources.string: Some permissions have been withdrawn. It is necessary to grant them again.

If you grant administrator rights to my application, then it cannot be uninstalled in the usual way. This is a limitation of the system, and unfortunately there is nothing I can do about it. Therefore, in order to remove the application, you need to manually revoke administrator rights or go to the application settings and find the button to remove it.
"According to Google Play policy, we need to notify you why we are requesting Accessibility permissions."
This permission will be used for:
1. To get information when the current application on the screen is changed.
The information collected is not saved and will be deleted after use.
For the application to work, you must agree to the collection of this data and grant permission in the device settings.
For the application to work correctly, you must turn off battery optimization. Go to settings?
